Author: mole_that_got_whackd

Comment: People come up to me all the time, seabed miners who never cried even when people said they had no love, they come up to me and they say "Sir, we'd like very much to do the seabed." And I ask them: is this about the tape? But they're talking about the land under the waters and using it for mining, OK? I know all about the sea, believe me. I know more than the dolphins, who are supposed to be the smartest animals in the sea according to my J.D. Frankly, a dolphin couldn't answer all the questions right like I did. You know we used to mine all the seas but we don't do that anymore because we want to be so open and so free. We won't even pick up the nickels even though they're everywhere. The nickels, and the quarters, they're all being picked up by the Manganese now. That's what they don't tell you.
Author: wonkalicious808
